message:
Dear HR Team,

A new job requisition has been submitted. Please review the details below and initiate the required process:

Job Requisition Details:

  • Designation: {{ doc.designation }}
  • Number of Positions: {{ doc.no_of_positions }}
  • Company: {{ doc.company }}
  • Department: {{ doc.department }}
  • Priority: {{ doc.custom_priority }}
  • Employment Type: {{ doc.custom_employment_type }}
  • Target Hiring Duration: {{ doc.custom_target_hiring_duration }}
  • Posting Date: {{ doc.posting_date.strftime('%d-%b-%Y') }}

Please log in to the system to review and take further action.

Best regards,
{{ doc.owner or "Hiring Manager" }}
name: New Job Requisition Alert
subject: New Job Requisition Alert at {{ doc.company }}
